jcr:content.jcr:description: Hike the trails all day in all conditions with the new Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX. Stay comfortable with a waterproof GORE-TEX membrane and ankle support.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX
jcr:content.pageTitle: The New Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX For All-Weather Hiking | Altra Running

Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX

Hike Mid GTX

content.headingContent: THE NEW OLYMPUS 5 HIKE MID GTX
content.subheadingContent: HIKE ALL TRAILS. HIKE ALL WEATHER. HIKE ALL DAY.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: The new Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX is your favorite trail buddy, ready for anything. Stay protected from the elements with waterproof GORE-TEX product technology, stay comfortable with max cushioning, and stay supported with a mid-ankle design.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
KEEP COMFORT IN AND WATER OUT.

Wet or muddy trails are no match for waterproof GORE-TEX product technology, guaranteed by GORE-TEX to protect you from the elements. Dry feet are the best way to enjoy all-day, all-weather adventures and the new Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX has what it takes to keep you moving comfortably for miles.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: LOCK IN AND HEAD OUT. Premium collar design provides a tailored locked-in feel for maximum responsiveness and stability, with support for your feet and ankles. Stay out there and keep moving for miles while your shoes stay put.

image.alt: Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX in Action

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
MAXIMUM GRIP FOR MAXIMUM ADVENTURE.

Hug the trails with Vibram® MegaGrip™. According to Vibram®, this high-performance sticky rubber offers unparalleled grip on both wet and dry surfaces. Maintain optimal ground adaptability on dirt, rocks, or whatever else the trail throws at you.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: THE ROOM YOU NEED FOR ALL-DAY FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT. With our Original FootShape™ Fit, you have the space you need to conquer the dirt. This fit gives your feet room in the toe box to spread out naturally and comfortably so you can keep running and discovering all day long.

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML: HIKE ALL TRAILS. HIKE ALL WEATHER. HIKE ALL DAY.
